results:
I searched for information about "Wichrowe Wzgórza" (Wuthering Heights) and how young Polish readers discuss it on social media platforms like TikTok and Instagram, particularly within the BookTok community. Here are the key findings:

## BookTok and Young Polish Readers

BookTok is a trendsetter in the literary world and also promotes reading, often among teenagers and young people who eagerly reach for Young Adult literature.(no content)BookTok is a community of young readers on the TikTok platform that has had a huge impact on young adult literature for several years.

## Current State of BookTok in Poland

Every other person using TikTok in Poland admits that they bought a book they learned about through the app.(no content)Most BookTok users are adults between 20 and 35 years old.(no content)In recent years, BookTok has grown into the most dynamic and opinion-forming book community online, whose influence has dominated bestseller lists also in Poland.

## Popular BookTok Content and Trends

BookTokers mainly present reading lifestyle - bookhauls showing purchased books, behaviors from the life of a typical reader, often referencing trending content on the platform, rankings, joint book arrangement on shelves, or "crushing" on favorite series characters.(no content)Popular trends among readers include matching musical playlists to books, showing interesting covers, and even presenting book arrangement systems on shelves. Common motifs on BookTok include showing the most interesting fragments or illustrations, and for those eager for novel adaptations - casting potential actors for characters!

## Popular Books and Authors in Polish BookTok

Polish BookTokers often express love for Colleen Hoover's series, along with other book recommendations and favorite publishing series that they eagerly share with their followers.(no content)In Poland, literature-related content on TikTok is created by creators like Magdalena Adamus (@catusgeekus) who reviews bestsellers and novels, Nela (@culturomaniaczka) who focuses mainly on young adult titles, Łukasz (@okonwsieci) who dedicates most time to crime fiction, and Rafał (@wpadloczytadlo) who mainly provides reviews of fiction from Poland and around the world.

While the search didn't reveal specific discussions about "Wichrowe Wzgórza" (Wuthering Heights) on Polish BookTok, it shows that the Polish BookTok community is very active in promoting reading among young people, with a focus on Young Adult and New Adult literature, romance, and contemporary bestsellers rather than classical literature.
